replies.body: so ahh when can i get my kled ;)

So no-ones talking about the aoe 2+ second stun they gave to nautilus ult? (2seconds + knockup) !?!
They'll be talking (crying) about it soon enough I reckon... naut just went from low-tier to god-tier-niche pick

I dont think its 2+ seconds, just 2 seconds. otherwise it would be worded more like "Active: Cho'Gath causes the target area to rupture after a 0.625 seconds delay, knocking up enemies hit for 1 second, slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds afterwards and dealing magic damage."
So I believe the knockup and stun overlap.
argets that Depth Charge passes through are now stunned for 1/1.5/2 seconds **in addition to** the knockup

Active: Nautilus sends out a depth charge that chases a Depth Charge Target target enemy champion, dealing magic damage, Airborne icon knocking them up for 1 second and Stun icon **stunning them on arrival**. All enemies hit along the way are also dealt magic damage, are Airborne icon knocked up for 1 second and are also Stun icon stunned.
Riot needs to work on consistency with wording. If the stun follows the knockup then it should be "stunned afterwards / when they land"
**In addition to** the knockup does not indicate if they are **concurrent** or not.

I think most people gave up caring after they made QSS not get rid of Zed's ult.

People are starting to realise that you cant argue with stupid.

and Riot is proving to be... well...

I wish they'd stop screwing around with Sona.
Of course the additional cooldown was going to break her, but you don't need to nerf all her other abilities into the ground to compensate.
Just admit the free cooldown was a stupid idea, and roll it, and the changes since it was added, back, then find a better way to balance things.

It really isn't a matter of JUST champion strength. Sona was fine, but now she's more fun and fits her identity more.
After she's been re-balanced properly she should be just as strong as she used to be but with a far more interactive kit.
We've taken a hit to the character's balance temporarily to make it a better champion in the long run and I see no issue with that.
What happened to katarina being able to cancel her ult by using q after a reset?

EASYHOON GOT A SKIN!!!! Was wondering whether he would get one, since he was the only sub to actually play, and he definitely deserved one, and he got it!!! So glad Riot is showing some support for the substitutes as well as the main players. Good work here Riot {{champion:268}}

Still waiting for Riot to start PROJECT: Webseries...

(seriously though, they've got a pretty decent setup for one already)
how long is this patch gonna take?

It's pretty small so probs like 2 - 5 minutes

10 if you have a toaster
